Heavy rain warning among raft of severe weather advisories issued for North Island as subtropical rainmaker bears down https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/severe-weather-warnings-possible-as-heavy-downpours-loom-for-north-island/NY7PIDTWZNFS7NZIKGKYPLPO6U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/severe-weather-warnings-possible-as-heavy-downpours-loom-for-north-island/NY7PIDTWZNFS7NZIKGKYPLPO6U/ An orange alert is already in place for one region, where up to 160mm could fall. Sun, 19 May 2024 22:53:15 +0000 An orange warning is already in place for Hawke’s Bay, where 120mm to 160mm could fall between 6am Tuesday and 6pm Wednesday - with peak rates potentially reaching 15mm to 25mm an hour tomorrow morning and afternoon. Image / MetService
